snippet: The chef, Francis Derby, who worked at Momofuku Ssam Bar, WD50, and avant-garde spots like Atlas, Tailor and Gilt, takes a pretty down to earth approach.
abstract: The chef, Francis Derby, who worked at Momofuku Ssam Bar, WD50, and avant-garde spots like Atlas, Tailor and Gilt, takes a pretty down to earth approach.
lead_paragraph: At King in SoHo, Francis Derby, who worked at Momofuku Ssam Bar, WD50 and avant-garde spots like Atlas, Tailor and Gilt, has subdued his inventive impulses somewhat for a more classical approach. His menu will offer smoked baby octopus salad, marinated charred mackerel and also chicken for two baked in salt with spaetzle. The approach in this intimate space is European; the room is accented with vintage pieces.The wine and beer lists emphasize Europe, too.
